title: Rewind to a Specific Commit
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes made to their codebase. One of the most useful features of Git is the ability to rewind back to a specific commit. This can be helpful when you need to undo changes or revert to an earlier version of your code.

meta.title: Rewind to a Specific Commit: Master Git Version Control
meta.description: Learn how to rewind your Git repository to a specific commit, undo changes, and restore an earlier version of your codebase.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, git, commit, git playground, undo, rewind

verify.name: Verify No Added file1.txt and file2.txt

i18n.title: 回退到特定提交
i18n.description: Git 是一个强大的版本控制系统，它允许开发者跟踪对其代码库所做的更改。Git 最有用的特性之一是能够回退到特定的提交。当你需要撤销更改或恢复到代码的早期版本时，这会很有帮助。

meta.title: 回退到特定提交：掌握 Git 版本控制
meta.description: 学习如何将你的 Git 仓库回退到特定提交、撤销更改以及恢复代码库的早期版本。
meta.keywords: 版本控制, Git 实验室, Git, 提交, Git 游乐场, 撤销, 回退
